name: Strange Roads
description:
Two cars are peacefully driving down a road when it suddenly opens up and drops them into a mysterious underworld from which they must escape.

The game is very short and can be finished in a couple of minutes, also there is no way to lose or get a game-over as I ran out of time to learn about and implement anything like that.

There are four levels and three mini-games between them, along with scenes at the start and end.

Assets used: 

Car models are from https://kenney.nl/assets

Engine sound: https://freesound.org/s/242740/

Intro and end scene music: https://opengameart.org/content/happy-adventure-loop

Background music: https://opengameart.org/content/cave-theme
